snippet.title: The Sims 4™ Island Living: Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Escape the ordinary and enjoy a laid-back lifestyle surrounded by beaches in The Sims 4 Island Living!* Explore a breezy world drenched in sun, sand, and endless fun as your Sims make their own paradise.

Available June 21, 2019 for PC and Mac and July 16, 2019 for Xbox One and PlayStation 4.

Learn more about this Expansion Pack: http://x.ea.com/58119.

*REQUIRES THE SIMS™ 4 ON APPLICABLE PLATFORM (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES TO PLAY. SEE MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR THIS EXPANSION.

#sims4 #islandliving
